name: SOF - RAIDERS
description: Special Operations Forces / Raiders - Restore the balance of power. The enemy will adapt, we offer a challenge to the right operator. This is a First Person Shooter with Role Play elements where your choices matter. Take the right mission at the right time or face the consequences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidea 740 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectSound XAudio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD quad core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidea 900 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any DirectSound XAudio
